title: Dynameblackssk
content:
Help....  
I need to find a true type font, its DynameBlackSSK. We have looked on the internet and it is not there - anywhere.  
If anyone knows where I can purchase this please contact me asap.

Thank you

Jim
author: Jim Lach

comments.content: SS(i) fonts are from infamous knockoff outfit [Southern Software, Inc](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130323/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Southern%252BSoftware%25252C%252BInc). You’ll be better off with the original: [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130323/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_bauhaus_std_by_adobe_complete_vp/).

Yepp. One other thing Jim: Hello and welcome to Typophile. You know, it’s a message board. Generally we don’t contact posters offline for a font I.D.

j a m e s
